reviewText:
no chapter selections
for those who need to know, there are no chapter breaks...also, this is really for fans of  mad angel films, if you like them you won't be disappointed...plot?--a guy in trouble with the local mob gets revenge as a zombie, and still finds compassion from an ex-girlfriend... which makes it more of a love story than a horror film, but hey, acting is ok and the local town feel makes it worth watching
